messages.subject: Commercial message, 27 inch papered katanan $2,625.00
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Guys, I had just sold this katana to a guy in early november, he has since lost his job and needs the money.  He is listing if for quite a bit cheaper than
messages.messageBody:
Hi Guys,

I had just sold this katana to a guy in early november, he has since
lost his job and needs the money. He is listing if for quite a bit
cheaper than he paid for it.

It is hard to find a NTHK papered Echizen 27 inch katana for
$2,625.00 - if not impossible. The blade is in old polish and has
some slight inactive rust in the kissaki - not very bad at all.

The blade has a very nice feel to it, it is not a heavy blade at all.

http://www.japaneseswordcollector.com/echsek/echsek.html

Please contact me if interested.

Regards,

Louis Skebo
